actions.committee: Committee on Agriculture, and in addition to the Committee on Resources, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned
actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Agriculture, and in addition to the Committee on Resources, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

actions.subcommittee: Department Operations, Oversight, Nutrition and Forestry
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Department Operations, Oversight, Nutrition and Forestry.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Department Operations, Oversight, Nutrition, and Forestry

official_title: To direct the Secretary of Agriculture to conduct a comprehensive evaluation of, and make necessary recommendations to Congress regarding, Federal and State laws that regulate private ownership of exotic wild animals.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to conduct an evaluation of Federal and State laws regulating private ownership of exotic wild animals, including issues related to such laws' enforcement and such animals' unregulated breeding.Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: To direct the Secretary of Agriculture to conduct a comprehensive evaluation of, and make necessary recommendations to Congress regarding, Federal and State laws that regulate private ownership of exotic wild animals.
